title: UI Retrogaming Sound Pack
description: More than 600 UI retrogaming sound effects
longDescription:
SOUNDCLOUD DEMO PREVIEW

 

More than 600 UI audio recordings and synthesized files.


UI Retrogaming Sound Pack can be used for any UI buttons but can also be used for spaceship engines, laser blasts and so on.


Perfect for video games, trailers and films. Ready for integration.


641 stereo and mono sound effects divided in 26 folders :

  • UI_SFX_RetroGaming
  • UI_SFX_RetroGaming_Bip_LowBit - 84 ITEMS
  • UI_SFX_RetroGaming_Bip_OldSchool - 27 ITEMS
  • UI_SFX_RetroGaming_Bip_VintageMood - 18 ITEMS
  • UI_SFX_RetroGaming_Cathodic - 17 ITEMS
  • UI_SFX_RetroGaming_Click_BinaryInsect - 26 ITEMS
  • UI_SFX_RetroGaming_Click_Tennis - 9 ITEMS
  • UI_SFX_RetroGaming_CoinPickUp - 12 ITEMS
  • UI_SFX_RetroGaming_CyberneticGenerator - 18 ITEMS
  • UI_SFX_RetroGaming_Cyborg - 29 ITEMS
  • UI_SFX_RetroGaming_DigitalCreature - 19 ITEMS
  • UI_SFX_RetroGaming_DigitalExplosion - 39 ITEMS
  • UI_SFX_RetroGaming_Dragon80 - 44 ITEMS
  • UI_SFX_RetroGaming_ElectricMetal - 25 ITEMS
  • UI_SFX_RetroGaming_Encryption - 10 ITEMS
  • UI_SFX_RetroGaming_IceCrack - 18 ITEMS
  • UI_SFX_RetroGaming_IngredientPickUp - 32 ITEMS
  • UI_SFX_RetroGaming_Loop - 7 ITEMS
  • UI_SFX_RetroGaming_Pixelated - 38 ITEMS
  • UI_SFX_RetroGaming_PixelComputing - 18 ITEMS
  • UI_SFX_RetroGaming_RetroFutur_Boot - 12 ITEMS
  • UI_SFX_RetroGaming_RustyMetal - 59 ITEMS
  • UI_SFX_RetroGaming_SubLaser_Boot - 8 ITEMS
  • UI_SFX_RetroGaming_Sub_Antenna - 21 ITEMS
  • UI_SFX_RetroGaming_VintageImpact - 21 ITEMS
  • UI_SFX_RetroGaming_WhistlingMetal - 30 ITEMS
technicalDetails:
Number of Audio Waves: 641

Number of Audio Cues: 641

Sample rate / bit rate: 48khz 24 bits

Do Sound FX loop: One shot and loop

Minutes of audio provided: Around 15 minutes

Supported Development Platforms:

Windows: Yes

Mac: Yes
